description: A domain defined for 3rd party data source in Profile Service

DomainName.description: The unique name of the domain.
DomainName.markdownDescription:
The unique name of the domain.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 64  

Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+$  

Update requires: No interruption

DeadLetterQueueUrl.description: The URL of the SQS dead letter queue
DeadLetterQueueUrl.markdownDescription:
The URL of the SQS dead letter queue

---

Required: No

Type: string   

Maximum Length: 255   

Update requires: No interruption

DefaultEncryptionKey.markdownDescription:
The default encryption key

---

Required: No

Type: string   

Maximum Length: 255   

Update requires: No interruption

DefaultExpirationDays.description: The default number of days until the data within the domain expires.
DefaultExpirationDays.markdownDescription:
The default number of days until the data within the domain expires.

---

Required: No

Type: integer     

Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: The tags (keys and values) associated with the domain
Tags.markdownDescription:
The tags (keys and values) associated with the domain

---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption

CreatedAt.markdownDescription:
The time of this integration got created

---

Required: No
